name: a64multi5
description: Multicolor charset for Commodore 64, extended with 5th color (colram) (codec a64_multi5)

options.name: mpv_flags
options.help: Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders. (default 0)

choices.name: skip_rd
choices.help: RD optimal MB level residual skipping

choices.name: qp_rd
choices.help: Use rate distortion optimization for qp selection

choices.name: cbp_rd
choices.help: use rate distortion optimization for CBP

choices.name: mv0
choices.help: always try a mb with mv=<0,0>

options.name: luma_elim_threshold
options.help: single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: chroma_elim_threshold
options.help: single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: quantizer_noise_shaping
options.help: (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: error_rate
options.help: Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: qsquish
options.help: how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function) (from 0 to 99) (default 0)

options.name: rc_qmod_amp
options.help: experimental quantizer modulation (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: rc_qmod_freq
options.help: experimental quantizer modulation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: rc_eq
options.help: Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.

options.name: rc_init_cplx

options.name: rc_buf_aggressivity
options.help: currently useless (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 1)

options.name: border_mask
options.help: increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders (from -FLT_MAX to FLT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: lmin
options.help: minimum Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 236)

options.name: lmax
options.help: maximum Lagrange factor (VBR) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 3658)

options.name: skip_threshold
options.help: Frame skip threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.help: what speed preset to use (from -1 to 10) (default -1)

options.help: number of tiles encode with (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default 0)

name: libsvtav1
description: SVT-AV1(Scalable Video Technology for AV1) encoder (codec av1)

options.name: hielevel
options.help: Hierarchical prediction levels setting (Deprecated, use svtav1-params) (from -1 to 4) (default -1)

options.name: la_depth
options.help: Look ahead distance [0, 120] (Deprecated, use svtav1-params) (from -1 to 120) (default -1)

options.name: tier
options.help: Set operating point tier (Deprecated, use svtav1-params) (from -1 to 1) (default -1)

options.name: preset
options.help: Encoding preset (from -2 to 13) (default -2)

options.name: crf
options.help: Constant Rate Factor value (from 0 to 63) (default 0)

options.name: qp
options.help: Initial Quantizer level value (from 0 to 63) (default 0)

options.name: sc_detection
options.help: Scene change detection (Deprecated, use svtav1-params) (default auto)

options.name: tile_columns
options.help: Log2 of number of tile columns to use (Deprecated, use svtav1-params) (from -1 to 4) (default -1)

options.name: tile_rows
options.help: Log2 of number of tile rows to use (Deprecated, use svtav1-params) (from -1 to 6) (default -1)

options.name: svtav1-params
options.help: Set the SVT-AV1 configuration using a :-separated list of key=value parameters

options.name: preset
options.help: Set the encoding preset (from 0 to 18) (default p4)

options.name: tune
options.help: Set the encoding tuning info (from 1 to 4) (default hq)

options.name: level
options.help: Set the encoding level restriction (from 0 to 24) (default auto)

options.name: tier
options.help: Set the encoding tier (from 0 to 1) (default 0)

options.name: rc
options.help: Override the preset rate-control (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

options.name: multipass
options.help: Set the multipass encoding (from 0 to 2) (default disabled)

choices.name: qres
choices.help: Two Pass encoding is enabled where first Pass is quarter resolution

choices.name: fullres
choices.help: Two Pass encoding is enabled where first Pass is full resolution

options.name: highbitdepth
options.help: Enable 10 bit encode for 8 bit input (default false)

options.name: tile-rows
options.help: Number of tile rows to encode with (from -1 to 64) (default -1)

options.name: tile-columns
options.help: Number of tile columns to encode with (from -1 to 64) (default -1)

options.name: surfaces
options.help: Number of concurrent surfaces (from 0 to 64) (default 0)

options.name: gpu
options.help: Selects which NVENC capable GPU to use. First GPU is 0, second is 1, and so on. (from -2 to INT_MAX) (default any)

options.name: rgb_mode
options.help: Configure how nvenc handles packed RGB input. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default yuv420)

options.name: delay
options.help: Delay frame output by the given amount of frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default INT_MAX)

options.name: rc-lookahead
options.help: Number of frames to look ahead for rate-control (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: cq
options.help: Set target quality level (0 to 51, 0 means automatic) for constant quality mode in VBR rate control (from 0 to 51) (default 0)

options.name: init_qpP
options.help: Initial QP value for P frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

options.name: init_qpB
options.help: Initial QP value for B frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

options.name: init_qpI
options.help: Initial QP value for I frame (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

options.name: qp
options.help: Constant quantization parameter rate control method (from -1 to 255) (default -1)

options.name: qp_cb_offset
options.help: Quantization parameter offset for cb channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)

options.name: qp_cr_offset
options.help: Quantization parameter offset for cr channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)

options.name: no-scenecut
options.help: When lookahead is enabled, set this to 1 to disable adaptive I-frame insertion at scene cuts (default false)

options.name: forced-idr
options.help: If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames. (default false)

options.name: b_adapt
options.help: When lookahead is enabled, set this to 0 to disable adaptive B-frame decision (default true)

options.name: spatial-aq
options.help: set to 1 to enable Spatial AQ (default false)

options.name: temporal-aq
options.help: set to 1 to enable Temporal AQ (default false)

options.name: zerolatency
options.help: Set 1 to indicate zero latency operation (no reordering delay) (default false)

options.name: nonref_p
options.help: Set this to 1 to enable automatic insertion of non-reference P-frames (default false)

options.name: strict_gop
options.help: Set 1 to minimize GOP-to-GOP rate fluctuations (default false)

options.name: aq-strength
options.help: When Spatial AQ is enabled, this field is used to specify AQ strength. AQ strength scale is from 1 (low) - 15 (aggressive) (from 1 to 15) (default 8)

options.name: weighted_pred
options.help: Enable weighted prediction (default false)

options.name: b_ref_mode
options.help: Use B frames as references (from -1 to 2) (default -1)

choices.name: disabled
choices.help: B frames will not be used for reference

choices.name: each
choices.help: Each B frame will be used for reference

choices.name: middle
choices.help: Only (number of B frames)/2 will be used for reference

options.name: dpb_size
options.help: Specifies the DPB size used for encoding (0 means automatic) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: ldkfs
options.help: Low delay key frame scale; Specifies the Scene Change frame size increase allowed in case of single frame VBV and CBR (from 0 to 255) (default 0)

options.name: intra-refresh
options.help: Use Periodic Intra Refresh instead of IDR frames (default false)

options.name: timing-info
options.help: Include timing info in sequence/frame headers (default false)

options.name: extra_sei
options.help: Pass on extra SEI data (e.g. a53 cc) to be included in the bitstream (default true)

options.name: a53cc
options.help: Use A53 Closed Captions (if available) (default true)

options.name: s12m_tc
options.help: Use timecode (if available) (default true)

options.name: low_power
options.help: Use low-power encoding mode (only available on some platforms; may not support all encoding features) (default false)

options.name: idr_interval
options.help: Distance (in I-frames) between IDR frames (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: b_depth
options.help: Maximum B-frame reference depth (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 1)

options.name: async_depth
options.help: Maximum processing parallelism. Increase this to improve single channel performance. This option doesn't work if driver doesn't implement vaSyncBuffer function. (from 1 to 64) (default 2)

options.name: max_frame_size
options.help: Maximum frame size (in bytes) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: rc_mode
options.help: Set rate control mode (from 0 to 6) (default auto)

choices.name: auto
choices.help: Choose mode automatically based on other parameters

options.name: profile
options.help: Set profile (seq_profile) (from -99 to 255) (default -99)

options.name: tier
options.help: Set tier (seq_tier) (from 0 to 1) (default main)

options.name: level
options.help: Set level (seq_level_idx) (from -99 to 31) (default -99)

options.name: tiles
options.help: Tile columns x rows (Use minimal tile column/row number automatically by default)

options.name: tile_groups
options.help: Number of tile groups for encoding (from 1 to 4096) (default 1)

options.name: quality
options.help: set quality (from 0 to 12) (default film3+)

options.name: max_extra_cb_iterations
options.help: Max extra codebook recalculation passes, more is better and slower (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 2)

options.name: skip_empty_cb
options.help: Avoid wasting bytes, ignore vintage MacOS decoder (default false)

options.name: max_strips
options.help: Limit strips/frame, vintage compatible is 1..3, otherwise the more the better (from 1 to 32) (default 3)

options.name: min_strips
options.help: Enforce min strips/frame, more is worse and faster, must be <= max_strips (from 1 to 32) (default 1)

options.name: strip_number_adaptivity
options.help: How fast the strip number adapts, more is slightly better, much slower (from 0 to 31) (default 0)

options.name: dither_type
options.help: Dither type (from 0 to 2) (default 1)

options.name: nitris_compat
options.help: encode with Avid Nitris compatibility (default false)

options.name: ibias
options.help: intra quant bias (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: profile
options.help: (from 0 to 5) (default dnxhd)

options.name: quant_deadzone
options.help: Quantizer dead zone (from 0 to 1024) (default 7)

options.name: compression
options.help: set compression type (from 0 to 3) (default none)

options.name: format
options.help: set pixel type (from 1 to 2) (default float)

options.name: gamma
options.help: set gamma (from 0.001 to FLT_MAX) (default 1)

options.name: slicecrc
options.help: Protect slices with CRCs (default auto)

options.name: coder
options.help: Coder type (from -2 to 2) (default rice)

options.name: context

options.name: pred
